blogPost.excerpt: Become a certified email marketing expert with this flexible online learning platform. Join the MailerLite Academy, a series of free video courses that let you learn at your own pace. Designed for both beginners and advanced email marketers. See you in class!
blogPost.body: Become a certified email marketing expert with this flexible online learning platform. Join the MailerLite Academy, a series of free video courses that let you learn at your own pace. Designed for both beginners and advanced email marketers. See you in class!
blogPost.title: Email Marketing Academy from MailerLite - Learning platform for email marketing expert certification
blogPost.author: Indrė Sizovaitė

localize.description: 借助这个灵活的在线学习平台，成为经过认证的电子邮件营销专家。加入MailerLite学院，这是一系列免费视频课程，让您按照自己的节奏学习。专为初学者和高级电子邮件营销者设计。课堂上见！
localize.tagline: 电子邮件营销专家认证学习平台

localize.description: 藉助這個靈活的在線學習平臺，成爲經過認證的電子郵件營銷專家。加入MailerLite學院，這是一系列免費視頻課程，讓您按照自己的節奏學習。專爲初學者和高級電子郵件營銷者設計。課堂上見！
localize.tagline: 電子郵件營銷專家認證學習平臺

previous.excerpt: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.
previous.title: Unstack Payments - eCommerce landing pages and membership sites

localize.description: Unstack的内容平台现在允许你设置一次性和订阅支付，以及推出会员网站，为用户提供细粒度的页面级访问控制。将您的数字内容变成一台赚钱的机器，使用Unstack and Strike(解栈和条带)。
localize.tagline: 电子商务登录页面和会员网站

localize.description: Unstack的內容平臺現在允許你設置一次性和訂閱支付，以及推出會員網站，爲用戶提供細粒度的頁面級訪問控制。將您的數字內容變成一臺賺錢的機器，使用Unstack and Strike(解棧和條帶)。
localize.tagline: 電子商務登錄頁面和會員網站

next.excerpt: A Notion page where you can discover products posted to Product Hunt in 2020 that gained the most votes each day displayed in a handy view 👌
next.title: Best of ProductHunt 2020 - A list of the most successful products launched in 2020 🏆

localize.description: 一个概念页面，您可以在其中查找在2020年发布到Product Hunt的每天获得最多选票的产品，并以方便的视图👌显示
localize.tagline: 2020年推出的最成功产品排行榜🏆

localize.description: 一個概念頁面，您可以在其中查找在2020年發佈到Product Hunt的每天獲得最多選票的產品，並以方便的視圖👌顯示
localize.tagline: 2020年推出的最成功產品排行榜🏆
